H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H174.def: = large tree which may reach a height of 36 m.; native to south-east Asia and northern India; ◄ Aquilaria ahallocha (agarwood); ► known for its fragrant wood; ≈ associated with fragrance and beauty

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5193.def: = action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors

H730.def: = evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

= water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7017.def: = ethnic group; ◄ possibly descendants of {L:Cain<SDBH:קַיִן>}; ► ally of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; associated with {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}' father-in-law

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H4912.def: = an utterance, often in poetic style, that has a specific message, such as an oracle, words of advice, wisdom, or mockery

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4186.def: = place where an inanimate object is located, such as the statue of a deity and a town

H386.def: = state of not being subject to change

H7064.def: = structure, made by birds ◄ from twigs, straw, grass, or other materials, ► to lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H7014.def: = a piece of metal, sharpened to a point, usually made out of iron or bronze, attached to the end of the spear

H1197.def: = process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H804.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of Assyria

H7617.def: = a person or group that has been forcibly carried off into slavery or exile

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H4912.def: = an utterance, often in poetic style, that has a specific message, such as an oracle, words of advice, wisdom, or mockery

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H2421.def: = process by which humans are alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H6716.def: = boat of a relatively large size; ► able to sail the sea and ocean

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3794.def: = nation regarded as descendants of {L:Javan<SDBH:יָוָן>}, son of {L:Japheth<SDBH:יֶפֶת>}, possibly to be identified with Greece

H6031.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H804.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of Assyria

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H8.def: = process of disappearing or being removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H1111.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zippor<SDBH:צִפֹּור>}; ► king of {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; tried to curse and destroy the Israelites on their way to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
